articles.content: Despite being released on September 7, Atlee Kumars Jawan starring Shah Rukh Khan, Nayanthara, Vijay Sethupathi, Deepika Padukone, and Sanya Malhotra, among many others is going strong at the box off… [+2052 chars]

articles.author: Saurabh Sinha
articles.title: Churchill's Old War Office in Whitehall to reopen as Hinduja Group's luxury hotel on Sept 26 - Times of India
articles.description: UK News: NEW DELHI: Winston Churchill's Old War Office in central London’s Whitehall will reopen as Hinduja Group's new luxury hotel on September 26, 2023.
